paragraph.label: 1026-52-b-1-ii-B
paragraph.content: $38 if the card issuer previously imposed a fee pursuant to paragraph (b)(1)(ii)(A) of this section for a violation of the same type that occurred during the same billing cycle or one of the next six billing cycles; or

interpParagraph.label: 1026-32-a-1-ii-Interp-1-iii
interpParagraph.content: For 2017, $1,029, reflecting a 1.1 percent increase in the CPI-U from June 2015 to June 2016, rounded to the nearest whole dollar.

interpParagraph.label: 1026-32-a-1-ii-Interp-3-iii
interpParagraph.content: For 2017, $20,579, reflecting a 1.1 percent increase in the CPI-U from June 2015 to June 2016, rounded to the nearest whole dollar.

interpParagraph.label: 1026-43-e-3-ii-Interp-1-iii
interpParagraph.content: For 2017, reflecting a 1.1 percent increase in the CPI-U that was reported on the preceding June 1, a covered transaction is not a qualified mortgage unless the transactions total points and fees do not exceed:

interpParagraph.label: 1026-43-e-3-ii-Interp-1-iii-A
interpParagraph.content: For a loan amount greater than or equal to $102,894: 3 percent of the total loan amount;

interpParagraph.label: 1026-43-e-3-ii-Interp-1-iii-B
interpParagraph.content: For a loan amount greater than or equal to $61,737 but less than $102,894: $3,087;

interpParagraph.label: 1026-43-e-3-ii-Interp-1-iii-C
interpParagraph.content: For a loan amount greater than or equal to $20,579 but less than $61,737: 5 percent of the total loan amount;

interpParagraph.label: 1026-43-e-3-ii-Interp-1-iii-D
interpParagraph.content: For a loan amount greater than or equal to $12,862 but less than $20,579: $1,029;

interpParagraph.label: 1026-43-e-3-ii-Interp-1-iii-E
interpParagraph.content: For a loan amount less than $12,862: 8 percent of the total loan amount.

interpParagraph.label: 1026-52-b-1-ii-Interp-2-i-D
interpParagraph.content: Card issuers were permitted to impose a fee for violating the terms of an agreement if the fee did not exceed $27 under § 1026.52(b)(1)(ii)(A), through December 31, 2016. Card issuers were permitted to impose a fee for violating the terms of an agreement if the fee did not exceed $37 under § 1026.52(b)(1)(ii)(B), through June 26, 2016, and $38 under § 1026.52(b)(1)(ii)(B) from June 27, 2016 through December 31, 2016.
